title: I have forgot my passcode and tried to enter into recovery mode but says no commands. What can i do?
content: I have forgotten the passcode on launch screen and it has been almost 3 years sinve i used the phone as i cracked the screen... Got it repaired but now it wont open and when i was looking at selections from recovery power off start booting options and such... One page said that the console is disabled and device state is locked what happened
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
